InvalidFlightNumberPrompt: Sorry. I couldn't find a match. Please tell me the confirmation number again
InvalidLastNamePrompt: Sorry. I couldn't find a match. Please spell out your last name.
FlightConfirmationNumber: {flight_booking_date} okay. What's the confirmation number? You can find it in the email you received at the time of booking.
FulfilmentResponse: Done. Your reservation has been cancelled. We will send the confirmation to your email. Anything else?
DeniedCancellation: Okay then, I will not proceed. Is there anything I can help you with?
Confirmation: {flight_booking_date}. Okay. Should I go ahead and cancel your reservation?
